Nambala ya ART EMR yomwe mwalowetsayi mwayitenga kuti?
Miyezi ya pa mankhwala siyingakhale yochepera 0 komanso yoposera miyezi yake yonse ya kubadwa.
Zaka za pa mankhwala sizingakhale zochepera 0 komanso zoposera zaka zake zobadwa.
Gwilitsani ntchito uthenga watsopano mu buku la ku chipatala
Chongani nthenda ina iliyonse yomwe munthuyi ali nayo
Simungasankhe palibe ngati mwasankha kale china!
Kodi ali pa ndondomeko ya mankhwala a ena mwa matenda awa?:
Gwilitsani ntchito uthenga watsopano mu buku la ku chipatala
Wonani mu bukhu la kuchipatala kuti ali ndi mtundu wanji wa matenda amu ubongo.

Sankhani mtundu wamatenda amene munthuyi ali nawo
Zitsanzo- nthenda yokutha magazi, nthenda ya chiwindi, kufa ziwalo, nthenda youmitsa mafupa

Miyezi isachepere 0 komanso isaposere miyezi khumi ndi umodzi
Kodi wakhala nthawi yaitali bwanji pa ART?
_Tsimikizani ngati nambala ya EMR ikugwilizana ndi ya mu m'buku la kuchipatala. Ngati zikusiyana konzani._
**Chonde lemberani fomu yofufuza matenda pakati pa ana ochepera zaka 5 mukamaliza kulemembera banja ili.**

**Wonjezerani munthu wina potsindikiza batani ili +.** Chotsani munthu uyu potsindikiza batani ili -
Tsiku lobadwa ndi zaka zomwe munthu ali nazo pa nthawiyo

bind.calculate: if(../dob_calendar > today(), 'Date of birth should not be greater than today.', if(../dob_calendar > date-time(decimal-date-time(today() - (10 * 365))) and ../dob_calendar < date-time(decimal-date-time(today() - (100 * 365))), 'Age must be between 10 and 100!', 'Age must be between 10 and 100!'))

if(../dob_calendar > today(), 'Date of birth should not be greater than today.', if(../dob_calendar > date-time(decimal-date-time(today() - (int(../c_cohort_constraint_lower) * 365))) and ../dob_calendar < date-time(decimal-date-time(today() - (int(../c_cohort_constraint_upper) * 365))), concat('Age must be between ', /data/repeat/child/c_cohort_constraint_lower , ' and ', /data/repeat/child/c_cohort_constraint_upper , '.'), concat('Age must be between ', /data/repeat/child/c_cohort_constraint_lower , ' and ', /data/repeat/child/c_cohort_constraint_upper , '.')))
if(../person_age_months <= 24 and ../dob_calendar != '', 0, if(../person_age_months > 24 and ../person_age_months < 60, 1, if(../person_age_months >= 60 or selected(../cohort, 'over_5'), 2, 3)))

if(selected(../conditions, 'none') and (count-selected(../conditions) > 1), 'None cannot be selected with any other choice!', if(selected(../conditions, 'eid') and selected(../conditions, 'art'), 'EID cannot be selected with ART!', ''))

bind.constraint: not(selected(../conditions,'none') and count-selected(.) > 1) and not(selected(../conditions, 'art') and selected(../conditions, 'eid'))

itemset.nodeset: instance('conditions')/root/item[is_lte_2 = /data/init/condition_age_group1 or is_btw_2_5 = /data/init/condition_age_group1 or is_over_5 = /data/init/condition_age_group1 or other = /data/init/condition_age_group1 ]

instance('conditions')/root/item[is_lte_2 = /data/repeat/child/condition_age_group2 or is_btw_2_5 = /data/repeat/child/condition_age_group2 or is_over_5 = /data/repeat/child/condition_age_group2 or other = /data/repeat/child/condition_age_group2 ]
